name: wastewatch-data-feeder
description: Feeds realistic trash detection data to the WasteWatch database

scripts.generate: node -e "const gen = require('./src/utils/dataGenerator'); const g = new gen(); g.addNewItems(15).then(() => console.log('✅ Generated 15 items and posted to database')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.generate-lots: node -e "const gen = require('./src/utils/dataGenerator'); const g = new gen(); g.addNewItems(25).then(() => console.log('✅ Generated 25 items and posted to database')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.generate-burst: node -e "const gen = require('./src/utils/dataGenerator'); const g = new gen(); g.addNewItems(50).then(() => console.log('✅ Generated 50 items and posted to database')).catch(console.error);"
